titles.title: Maritime Administration Authorization and Enhancement Act for Fiscal Year 2018
Maritime Administration Authorization and Enhancement Act for Fiscal Year 2018
Maritime Administration Authorization and Enhancement Act for Fiscal Year 2018
Maritime Administration Authorization and Enhancement Act for Fiscal Year 2018
A bill to amend and enhance certain maritime programs of the Department of Transportation, and for other purposes.
Maritime Administration Authorization and Enhancement Act for Fiscal Year 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Thune with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 115-136.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 182.
